meanings.sent1: The doctor noticed tiny pemphixes on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: She applied ointment to the pemphixes to help them heal.
meanings.sent3: The pemphixes on the bubble wrap looked like little bumps.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled up like pemphixes on the surface.
meanings.sent5: The pemphixes on the leaf showed signs of disease.

meanings.definition: The outer layer of the skin.
meanings.sent1: Sunscreen protects your pemphixes from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent2: His pemphixes felt rough after spending the day in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The lotion made her pemphixes feel soft and smooth.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush glided over the canvas like silk on pemphixes.
meanings.sent5: The pemphixes on the apple were shiny and unblemished.
